title: Luscious Pumpkin and Leek Soup
ingredients: ['1 (1kg) whole pumpkin', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 leek, washed and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '2 bay leaves', '5 sprigs parsley', '225ml dry white wine', '1 litre chicken stock', 'salt', 'freshly ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons creme fraiche', 'white wine vinegar to taste', '1 teaspoon dark brown soft sugar']
